DOC.brief_title: The Association Between Fluid Administration , Oxytocin Administration , Fetal Heart Rate Changes
DOC.detailed_description: After obtain informed , write consent , candidate randomize one four group time request labor analgesia . All subject receive maintenance infusion Lactated Ringers ( LR ) . For candidate Groups A B , intravenous bolus 1000 mL LR initiate . Candidates Groups C D receive additional fluid . If randomize group A C , oxytocin management continue per normal active management labor protocal ( AMOL ) . If randomize group B D , dose oxytocin administer halve increased 60 minute initiation epidural analgesia . Fetal heart rate monitoring frequency uterine contraction record external tocodynamometry .
DOC.criteria: Age 1860 Healthy nulliparous multiparous woman Term ( > 36 week gestation ) Singleton pregnancy Spontaneous labor spontaneous rupture membrane Receive oxytocin Request neuraxial analgesia Under 18 year age Presence systemic disease ( e.g. , diabetes mellitus , hypertension , preeclampsia ) Use chronic analgesic medication Prior administration systemic opioid labor analgesia Nonvertex presentation Induction labor Contraindication neuraxial analgesia .
